nodes.text: The Corbos system was a star system in the galaxy. At one point, it was protected by a Jedi Watchman. However, the Watchman became corrupted after being anonymously gifted a gauntlet crafted by the Sith Lord Neer, leading his fellow Jedi to strike him down.
The Corbos system was first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars: Force and Destiny sourcebook Nexus of Power. In the Legends continuity, it was located in the Outer Rim's Esstran sector.
